title: Ice Sickle
summaries: The Ice Sickle is a Hardmode melee weapon that fires a projectile with no ammunition or mana cost. The projectile will gradually reduce speed and eventually stops in midair, exist up to 5 seconds before disappearing, and can pierce a limited number of targets. It can be dropped by Armored Vikings, Ice Elementals, Ice Tortoises, and Icy Mermen, these enemies can spawn in Snow and Ice biomes.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, its projectile deals 50% (25) base damage, can pierce up to 2 enemies, dissipating upon hitting the third. Its drop chance is 1*1/100 (1%).

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, its projectile deals 100% ( 42 / 40) base damage, can pierce up to 4 enemies, dissipating upon hitting the fifth. Its drop chance is 0.56*1/180 (0.56%).
